definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
7th earthly branch: 11 a.m.-1 p.m., noon, 5th solar month (6th June-6th July), year of the Horse/ancient Chinese compass point: 180° (south)

sentences.english: German schools, for instance, close at midday.
sentences.chinese: 例如，德國的學校在中午關門。

sentences.english: After my noon run, I rushed to the market to buy a lot of different spices.
sentences.chinese: 我中午跑完步之後，馬上衝去買一大堆香料。

sentences.english: The fighting at Langfang continued for eight hours until noon yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 昨日廊坊的激戰持續了8個小時，一直到中午才結束。

sentences.english: At noon, Dorothy unlocked the rest-room door and discovered that he was gone.
sentences.chinese: 到了中午，託羅絲找開廁所的門，卻發現它不見了。

sentences.english: Complete according to " had eaten in the morning, satiate midday, eat in the evening little " principle.
sentences.chinese: 完全按照“早上喫好，中午喫飽，晚上喫少”的原則。

sentences.english: About noon the robbers visited their cave.
sentences.chinese: 到了中午強盜們來視察他們的山洞了。

sentences.english: The din in the factory ends abruptly when the noon whistle sounds.
sentences.chinese: 當中午的笛聲響起時，工廠裏的嘈雜聲頓時停止了。

sentences.english: Huang taiji at noon on the second day if the killer is not on the monkey to justice was put to death on her.
sentences.chinese: 皇太極下旨第二日中午如果兇手還不歸案就處死玉兒。

sentences.english: Asymptotic noon, buy flowers to people more.
sentences.chinese: 漸近中午，買花的人也多了。

sentences.english: In the mid-day the gong sounds at the palace gate.
sentences.chinese: 中午，鑼聲在廟殿門前敲起。

sentences.english: I will hit the town before noon.
sentences.chinese: 我可在中午之前到達鎮上。

sentences.english: At noon, you’ll watch the changing of the guard.
sentences.chinese: 中午可以觀賞到衛兵換崗的儀式。

sentences.english: As of noon on Saturday, the water had risen to within 20 meters of the mine opening.
sentences.chinese: 截至星期六中午，水位已上升到距礦井口約20米處。

sentences.english: Thanks to Mr. Li Jing's donation, we will provide free pizza for lunch.
sentences.chinese: 多謝李競先生的捐款，中午將提供免費比薩。

sentences.english: Will you be able to finish your work by noort?
sentences.chinese: 中午以前你能把工作做完嗎？

definition: in the evening/when night falls/towards evening/at night fall/at dusk
at dawn/at first light/first thing in the morning
